contentList.content: *With all Minthara's hate, you wonder if her cerebro-spinal fluid will be bitter to sip?*
*You could set the slander right at last - tell the world every bite was perfect.*
*All this stimulating conversation leaves you hungry.*
*This is highly illogical... There are plenty of other craniums awaiting your suction, and this is a prize ally.*
*Every time Halsin speaks of balance, your thoughts cannot behave.*
*What better reunion than this eternal bond?*
*You would save his temporal lobe for last, if you were to eat Gale.*
*The buffet table at this party bears pie, punch and cocktail sausages.*
*That will make her especially chewy - just how you like a cortex to be.*
*And besides - this brain before you - its endorphins are in a joyous flow.*
Glance around - is there anything else you could eat?
*Weary Jaheira. Over time, her stresses may have shrunk her hippocampus, making its taste more intense.*
Begin your harvest.
*There are cruel rumours spread, that Minsc may once have suffered injury to his brain.*
*The hormone of love is swelling somewhere in this skull.*
*Wyll's frontal lobe, which processes his judgement and measured words, would be a delicacy befitting his nobility.*
*You only dream of what cerebellum tastes like, when it sends the signals to his vestibular system to keep him from wobbling.*
*No respite shall be had at this pitiful smorgasbord.*
*His parietal lobe - which controls his sense of touch - will be an aphrodisiac in your maw.*
*To speak is not enough. You wish to explore the brain of your friend with your beak.*
*It is a wonderful scent - the odour of friendship.*
Resist the craving.
*On consuming a brain, you become one with its owner. Every memory blends with yours.*
*And besides - the hypothalamus in this brain before you is secreting.*
*Language. Learning. Memory. He must have quite the fine example.*
*Think of Shadowheart's cerebellum, which controls her dextrous hands. Any ritual caster must have a tightly commanded hindbrain.*
*You consider Karlach's brain stem - the stalk meant to regulate her body's temperature. Will it come pre-cooked?*
*Astarion's sweet brain may be a bit less wrinkled than the rest, but you hunger for its teasing cells.*
*Wyll's frontal lobe, which processes his judgement and measured words, would be a delicacy fit for a Grand Duke.*
*You shall dine well tonight.*
*Lae'zel's motor cortex - that which controls her fine movements - will be harshly disciplined.*
You are hungry.
You are hungry.
Yes... help me... I don't want to hurt anyone...
I am. And I will take what I want.
Focus on me. I will siphon off as much of the craving as I can.
Relax... breathe... it will pass.
This is an ally! A friend! You have nothing to gain by consuming them!
You're right... I was distracted by how delicious they would be.
I have everything to gain. Their thoughts, memories, personality... I will give them all a magnificent home within me.
Yes. And you would turn everyone here against us. We would lose everything we had built over our journey against the Netherbrain.
*A phantom presence wraps itself around you. It is peace, warmth, care... and the strength to resist.*
Do you not wish to partake? This is what we are. This is what we do.
No, it is not. A brain's aptitude for consumption is made of far more than its taste. Do not be blinded by desire.
*The beast within you is losing, but it has not withdrawn.*
I am a mind flayer. I will consume my prey. And I will not be controlled by you.
I suppose you're right. Another will serve as sustenance.
Darling, you are being irrational! Do not do this!
It's alright. You are still learning how to control yourself.
Yes, they will.
Your control is improving. You resisted your urge well.
It was foolish of us to hope that the skeleton would provide for his aberrant guests. He has always been vocal about his distaste of illithids.
Fortunately, these wilds are littered with suitable meals. We will find something to eat on the way home.
That was too close. I almost gave in.
You didn't. That's all that matters now. We will be better prepared for contact with our non-illithid allies in the future.
Thank you for the help. You definitely made that easier for me.
But for now - let us enjoy the rest of the party.
And I'm sure the hunt will make for a deeply satisfying meal.
You are welcome, my love. We will be better prepared for contact with our non-illithid allies in the future.
That felt like a missed opportunity. I wish I had done it.
That is your hunger whispering to you. You have the strength to silence it.
My love...!
FOOL! You have cost us dearly!
I'm glad you saw reason.
I don't think I needed any help. I resisted easily.
Perhaps. But knowing when to use caution instead of arrogance is a valuable skill.
Resist the craving.
The Emperor is psychically reducing your urge.
The Emperor is psychically reducing your urge.
The Emperor is psychically reducing your urge.
The Emperor is psychically reducing your urge.
Yes. What do I do?
I'm mighty enough to resist. Watch!
Darling, this is not the time for theatrics. I know how your mind feels when you want to feed. Let me help you.
I'm not being theatrical! I'll be fine.
Actually, you're right. I'm hungrier than I thought.
This is an unnecessary risk. Hubris will not reward you anything.
The Emperor is psychically reducing your urge.
Well, it seems like you are in control. While your restraint is impressive, I must again remind you of the dangers of overconfidence.
*Your attention returns to your companion, who remains oblivious to the exchange of thoughts that took place before them.*
The Emperor is psychically reducing your urge.
You told me to embrace my hunger before I consumed Orpheus. You are being hypocritical.
No, I'm not. That was a necessary assimilation. Your hunger is not fit for every non-illithid, especially those we value.
Don't worry, I'll be fine.
My love, you are salivating over an ally's brain. I know how your mind feels when you want to feed. Let me help you.
Really, I'm not that hungry.
Good... it has passed.
...It hurts to see you struggle with this.
Very well, love. I trust you.
